name: 11.20 "Look Before You Sleep" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 11 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was having their house fumigated?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	He said he had a real insect problem. He said he was staying with a stewardess who "offered to bump him up to first class".

questions.text: Who offered Sam a place to stay?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Sam turned down the offer because he'd rather spend it with a woman he would have sex with. Rebecca told him if he did need a place to give her a call.

questions.text: When Sam locked himself out of Cheers, what was still in the bar?
options: His keys and the stewardess' address
His keys and Rebecca's phone number
questions.explanation:
His keys and wallet.

	He had no proof of identity, no money and no place to stay. So, he ended up going to Rebecca's after all...eventually.

questions.text: Why didn't Carla have her keys?
questions.explanation:
Sam had her set.

	Woody lost his keys so Sam gave him his set and Carla gave Sam her set. Then Woody lost Sam's set of keys as well.

questions.text: Why were all the hotels filled?
questions.correct: The Shriner's convention was in town.
options: It's Boston, everyone likes to visit Boston.
A big apartment building burned down.
questions.explanation:
The Shriner's convention was in town.

	Sam tried to get a room at a hotel, but needed one who would let him pay the next morning. The hotel manager said he didn't have any rooms to give.

questions.text: Why couldn't Sam sleep at Norm's house?
questions.correct: Norm didn't want to sleep with Vera.
options: Norm really didn't like Sam that much.
questions.explanation:
Norm didn't want to sleep with Vera.

	Sam was planning to sleep on the couch. Norm at first was going to let him until Vera said, "Come here lover boy", then Norm came out of the bedroom and kicked Sam off the couch.

Frederick.

	Sam was going to sleep at Frasier's, but Frederick wouldn't stop crying. Frasier said it was normal behavior for a four year old and he wasn't going to give in to it.

questions.text: Why didn't Sam stay at Cliff's house?
options: Sam didn't know where Cliff's house was.
questions.explanation:
Cliff wouldn't stop talking.

	Sam was exhausted and just wanted to sleep, but Cliff kept wanting to play word games.  Cliff and Ma Clavin started fighting which also kept Sam awake.

questions.text: What happened when Sam went to Rebecca's?
questions.correct: She locked them both out of her apartment.
options: She refused to let him stay after he mocked her earlier.
He finally got a good night's sleep.
questions.explanation:
She locked them both out of her apartment.

	Sam told her to call the super. She informed him that she was the super.

questions.text: In the end, whose house did Sam and Rebecca stay at?
questions.explanation:
Cliff's.

	They didn't get much sleep because of Cliff's word games. They finally gave in and just played the games with Cliff.
